verses.name: Luke 19:43
verses.text: For the days shall come upon thee, that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee, and compass thee round, and keep thee in on every side,

verses.name: Luke 19:44
verses.text: And shall lay thee even with the ground, and thy children within thee; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation.

verses.name: Luke 19:45
verses.text: And he went into the temple, and began to cast out them that sold therein, and them that bought;
